videos.title: HTMX Crash Course by Traversy Media
videos.description: Learn HTMX by creating a couple of small projects with a Node.js and Express backend, including a contacts search, temperature converter, mock weather app with polling and form validation component. We will learn about the common HTMX attributes like hx-get, hx-post, hx-swap, etc.

videos.title: React Server Components by Lee Robinson
videos.description: Discussing a well-written, thoughtful article about React and Next.js.

assignments.title: Create a simple to-do list application that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks without full page reloads.
assignments.video_title: HTMX Crash Course by Traversy Media

quizzes.question: What does the hx-get attribute do in HTMX?

options.option: Triggers JavaScript on element click
Fetches data from a URL and updates the element
Submits a form and displays the response
Defines a custom event handler

quizzes.video_title: HTMX Crash Course by Traversy Media

quizzes.question: Which element is NOT necessary for a basic HTMX form submission?

options.option: <form> tag with hx-post attribute
Input elements with corresponding names
Submit button or link with hx-trigger attribute
JavaScript code to handle the form data

quizzes.video_title: HTMX Crash Course by Traversy Media

quizzes.question: What is the main advantage of using React Server Components compared to traditional client-side rendering?

options.option: Improved SEO due to pre-rendered content.
Reduced client-side JavaScript bundle size.
Enhanced interactivity for complex UIs.
Simplified state management in React components.

quizzes.video_title: React Server Components by Lee Robinson

quizzes.question: Which tools and libraries are currently compatible with React Server Components?

options.option: Any framework or library that supports React can be used.
Next.js is the primary framework for using server components.
Dedicated tooling and libraries are still under development.
React Server Components can only be used in standalone projects.

quizzes.video_title: React Server Components by Lee Robinson

quizzes.question: What are some potential future applications of React Server Components beyond typical web development?

options.option: Server-side rendering for mobile apps and hybrid platforms.
Integrating React with server-side frameworks like Node.js or Go.
Building real-time collaborative applications and platforms.
Not one of the above.

quizzes.video_title: React Server Components by Lee Robinson
